channel.title: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE

item.title: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 1)

See the bold part “&&playerRights >=1”?

It means only moderators, players with admin rank 1 can use the command.

So once again, make.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”))

Also notice the exta ) I added.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE

item.title: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @Kid1 -Kid-
item.description:
@Kid1 wrote:

Woop. Thanks huggies, that worked.

Thats one problem solved.

Unfortunately, the commands don’t work for normal players, only admins. (::commands worked)
Can you tell me whats wrong? :S I cant see what is wrong with my commands.

Below is one command which doesn’t work for normal players. Help please

} else if (command.startsWith("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(2491,1); addItem(2497,1); addItem(1115,1); addItem(2577,1); addItem(2581,1); addItem(4151,1); addItem(5698,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(6568,1); addItem(2436,1); addItem(2440,1); addItem(2442,1); addItem(2444,1);

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && playerRights >= 1)

Change that to:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands"))

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE

item.title: I need help with my commands problem, HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @Kid1 -Kid-
item.description:
@Kid1 wrote:

Ok, I’ve added this and I’ve made it so ANYONE in my server can type like ::commands and all the commands that comes up, if you know what I mean. (::commands is for command list).

None of my commands work for normal players, they only work for admins. Can you help me?
This is what my code is just for my list of commands. Help is appreciated.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && playerRights >= 1) { sendQuest("@dre@Command Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@-Command List-", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::dags (zombie) ::desert (mime) ::dive (initiate)@dbl@", 8146); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::castle (white and Black Armour)@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Potions - ::pots@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Starters - ::mage ::archer ::melee ::pure ::ghostly@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Teles - ::lake ::jad ::home ::ice ::pk@dbl@", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Clan Wars - ::team1 ::team2 ::team3@dbl@", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Manta Rays - ::food @dbl@", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Bones - ::bones@dbl@", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Wepons - ::weapons@dbl@", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Full Dragon - ::dragon@dbl@", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Barrows Armour - ::barrows@dbl@", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Suggestions - ::suggest YOUR MESSAGE@dbl@", 8158); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
